page.title: 17Bondleigh Recreation
page.content: Interest in the past. {Sealed Knot and English Civil War {Society:}aim to recreate l7c. life, for education and entertainment. {Sealed Knot}- Stocker family, Bouchers Hill. Mr. Stocker, Gun Commander of Slannings, has made a cannon; Mrs Stocker has made authentically 16c. designed uniforms from hand woven cloth.{English Civil War Society.} Col. of Lord Hopton's Foote Regiment lives Yellands. Organised training weekend. Kings Army on route march when ambushed by Parliamentarian Cavalry at Yeo, also skirmish and lamb roasting at Yellands. Serious hobby; Mr.Palfrey rearing, training horses to form company Dragoons. Women now admitted. Large sums of money collected for charity.
